title: minecraft:rideable
description: Determines whether this entity can be ridden. Allows specifying the different seat positions and quantity.

controlling_seat.description: The seat that designates the driver of the entity

seat_count.description: The number of entities that can ride this entity at the same time

seats.description: The list of positions and number of riders for each position for entities riding this entity

known_problems.description: Entities being ridden cannot use minecraft:spawn_entity.
